section-header.title: INTRODUCING APOLLO
section-header.tagline: While Apollo hovered over the moon, it broke ground collecting unique data in a weightless environment. Think of our new design language as a North Star.
section-header.summary: Apollo is our new design language at IMS Health. It represents weightless conversation better than the Apollo orbiter? While we cannot walk every step of your journey with you, it is our sincere desire to layout principles that guide the direction of your odyssey.
section-header.quote: Tone of voice, eye contact, even gestures, all play a part in creating the personality of the message.

section-content.summary: A design language is a form of communication that, like any other, facilitates conveyance of an intended message to an audience. Any effective communication, verbal or visual, is made up of the same building blocks: context, delivery, and expression.
